items.title: Homes for Sale in New York City and the Region
items.abstract: This week’s properties are in Clinton Hill, Brooklyn, Thornwood, N.Y., and Stamford, Conn.

items.title: On the Market in the Region
items.abstract: This week’s properties include homes in Stamford, Conn., and Allendale, N.J.

items.title: Scenes from New York City as Ida paralyzes region.
items.abstract: The sudden inundation from the remnants of Ida transformed familiar moments of life in New York City and its suburbs into something otherworldly, waterlogged and frightening.

items.title: Agriculture Dept. Announces Plan to Move Economists to Kansas City Region
items.abstract: The relocation plan follows criticism from career staff members who have been fearful about their jobs being moved and who have speculated that the Trump administration is trying to stifle research.

items.title: Suburban Home Sales Soar in the New York Region
items.abstract: Lines of cars at open houses and multiple offers above the asking price, often all cash, have become a regular occurrence.
